abstract: The Facebook example is yet another confirmation of studies that have shown that on average individual investors lose out consistently when they buy and trade individual stocks.
snippet: The Facebook example is yet another confirmation of studies that have shown that on average individual investors lose out consistently when they buy and trade individual stocks.
lead_paragraph: Since the implosion of the dot-com bubble in 2000, retail investors have been rightfully wary of the stock market. Facebook was going to change it all, bringing the ordinary investor back.

headline.main: In Picking Facebook Shares, Repeating the Mistakes of the Past
